title: Siri, turn off my lights: Philips Hue with Hue Bridge 2.0 tested
text:
Siri, turn off my lights: Philips Hue with Hue Bridge 2.0 tested 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Philips has introduced a new bridge for the Hue lighting system that adds Apple HomeKit functionality to the experience. The move means Appl...
